sentences.sContent: He also wants a "large-scale rearmament" of the Army and Navy beginning in 2011.
sentences.sContent_eng: He also wants a "large-scale rearmament" of the Army and Navy beginning in 2011.
sentences.sCn: 他还准备从2011年起，对陆军和海军进行“大规模重新装备”。

sentences.sContent: Follow-through on rearmament, nuclear and otherwise, would work against Russia's economic and strategic interests.
sentences.sContent_eng: Follow-through on rearmament, nuclear and otherwise, would work against Russia's economic and strategic interests.
sentences.sCn: 重整军备、核以及其他将与俄罗斯的经济和战略利益背道而驰。

words.tran: 使重整军备，使重新武装

trans.tranOther: Rearmament is the process of building up a new stock of military weapons
